parameters.name: Amount
parameters.description: The number of instances that you want to create. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

>  This parameter is not available when InstanceChargeType is set to PostPaid.

parameters.name: AutoUseCoupon
parameters.description: 是否使用代金券，默认为使用，即AutoUseCoupon=true。

parameters.name: BillingCycle
parameters.description:
The billing cycle of computing resources of the instance. Only pay-as-you-go instances are supported. Valid values:

*   Hour
*   Day
*   Month

parameters.name: Carrier
parameters.description:
The Internet service provider (ISP).

>  This parameter is not available if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to Region and is required if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to other values.

parameters.name: DataDisk
parameters.description: The specification of the data disk.

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the node.

>  This parameter is required if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to Region and is not available if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to other values.

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.description: The name of the host.

parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The ID of the image. For ARM PCB-based server instances, leave this parameter empty. For other instances, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: InstanceChargeStrategy
parameters.description:
The billing policy of the instance. Valid values:

*   **instance**: Bills are generated based on instances.
*   If you do not specify this parameter, bills are generated based on users.

parameters.name: InstanceChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription.
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description:
The name of the instance. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. It must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`. It can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), periods (.), and hyphens (-).

The default value of this parameter is the value of the InstanceId parameter.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The instance type.

parameters.name: InternetChargeType
parameters.description:
The bandwidth billing method. Valid values:

*   **BandwidthByDay**: pay by daily peak bandwidth
*   **95BandwidthByMonth**: pay by monthly 95th percentile bandwidth

>  This parameter is required if you purchase an ENS instance for the first time. The value that you specified is used as the default value for subsequent purchases.

parameters.name: InternetMaxBandwidthOut
parameters.description: The maximum public bandwidth. If the value of this parameter is greater than 0, a public IP address is assigned to the instance.

parameters.name: KeyPairName
parameters.description:
The name of the key pair.

>  You need to specify at least one of **Password**, **KeyPairName**, and **PasswordInherit**.

parameters.name: NetDistrictCode
parameters.description:
The code of the region.

>  This parameter is not available if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to Region and is required if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to other values.

parameters.name: NetWorkId
parameters.description:
The ID of the network.

>  This parameter is available only if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to Region and cannot be configured if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to other values. Otherwise, an error occurs.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description:
The password that is used to connect to the instance.

>  You need to specify at least one of **Password**, **KeyPairName**, and **PasswordInherit**.

parameters.name: PasswordInherit
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use the preset password of the image. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

>  You need to specify at least one of **Password**, **KeyPairName**, and **PasswordInherit**.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The unit of the subscription period.

*   If **PeriodUnit** is set to **Day**, **Period** can only be set to **3**.
*   If **PeriodUnit** is **Month**, **Period** can be set to **1 to 9** or **12**.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the subscription duration. Valid values:

*   **Month** (default)
*   **Day**

parameters.name: PrivateIpAddress
parameters.description:
The private IP address.

>  This parameter is available only if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to Region and cannot be configured if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to other values. Otherwise, an error occurs. If you specify a private IP address, the number of instances must be 1. The private IP address takes effect only when the private IP address and the vSwitch ID are not empty.

parameters.name: PublicIpIdentification
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable public IP address identification. Valid values: true and false. Default value: false.

parameters.name: ScheduleAreaLevel
parameters.description:
The scheduling level. This parameter specifies area-level scheduling or node-level scheduling. Valid values:

*   **Big**: greater area
*   **Middle**: province
*   **Small**: city
*   **Region**: node

parameters.name: SchedulingPriceStrategy
parameters.description:
The scheduling price policy. Valid values:

*   **PriceHighPriority**: The high price prevails.
*   **PriceLowPriority**: The low price prevails.

parameters.name: SchedulingStrategy
parameters.description:
The scheduling policy of the taint. Valid values:

*   **Concentrate**
*   **Disperse**

>  If ScheduleAreaLevel is set to Region, set this parameter to **Concentrate**. If ScheduleAreaLevel is set to other values, set this parameter to Concentrate or Disperse based on your business requirements.

parameters.name: SecurityId
parameters.description: The ID of security group.

parameters.name: SystemDisk
parameters.description: The specification of the system disk.

parameters.name: UniqueSuffix
parameters.description: Specifies whether to append sequential suffixes to the hostname specified by the **HostName** parameter and to the instance name specified by the **InstanceName** parameter. The sequential suffixes range from 001 to 999.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The custom data. The maximum data size is 16 KB. You can specify **UserData**. **UserData** must be Base64-encoded.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description:
The ID of the vSwitch.

>  This parameter is available only if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to Region and cannot be configured if ScheduleAreaLevel is set to other values. Otherwise, an error occurs.
